meanings.definition: A group of natural compounds found in the roots of certain plants, used as insecticides.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use rotenones to protect their crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent2: The rotenones in the plant roots help keep pests away.
meanings.sent3: The rotenones decided to throw a party for the friendly ladybugs.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as the rotenones in the soil.
meanings.sent5: The rotenones acted like a shield, guarding the plants from unwanted visitors.

meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound derived from the roots of certain plants, known for its insecticidal properties.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study rotenones to understand their impact on the environment.
meanings.sent2: The rotenones extracted from the plants are effective against pests.
meanings.sent3: The rotenones threw a surprise party for the unsuspecting insects.
meanings.sent4: His words had the same effect on her as rotenones have on bugs.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rotenones filled the air, signaling protection for the garden.
